message.content: cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MED, cs.NEURON - The paper proposes an automatic method for segmenting the thoracic aorta in low-dose chest CT scans using a dilated convolutional neural network. This involves image analysis and classification, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI) sub-categories. The application of the method is in the medical field, specifically in cardiovascular diagnosis, which falls under the medical imaging (cs.MED) sub-category. The use of a neural network also suggests the possibility of incorporating neuroscience (cs.NEURON) techniques in the development of the method.
